title: Qualitative Heat Map
description: The following Heat Maps were created using Qualitative Data from a personal survey by visiting each library floor. Data was taken on each floor's temperature, relative humidity, lighting/electricity usage, trends we noticed, as well as a qualitative comfort-score (ranging between 0-100, in blocks of 5). Please keep in mind that this map uses a Qualitative Metric, instead of a Quantitative one. The purpose of these maps were to better understand the initial trends throughout the library, aid in our prelimnary research, and create an interactive draft as shown.
